title: Halloween Costumes - Pumpkin Plush Costume Infant/Toddler Orange & Black (one size up to 24 months)
features: For Your Pumpkin Loving Kids – For those Halloweens you’re too tired to DIY, for first-timer trick-or-treaters, and for babies who are already as cute as a pumpkin pie! This toddler pumpkin Halloween costume can be worn to rock your kids’ party!

Comfortable Fit – The costume is well-stitched with wide holes for the arms, neck, and legs to fit kids comfortably. It is easy to wear and remove and not inconvenient for kids at all. This kids pumpkin costume can be worn by 2T to small 3T.

Attractive and Bright Pumpkin Colors – The costume comes in vivid colors of orange, green, and black and gives a premium look and feel for your kids. It can be reused or shared with younger siblings and friends. Style this costume to get compliments all the time!

Pumpkin Patch and Halloween Parties! – Have a costume set for a quick party or trick or treat getup! This is a perfect kids jackolantern costume or pumpkin patch outfit for your little ones. No one will be able to match your kid’s style vibe.

Easy Clean Quality Materials – The high-quality fabric of this costume is resistant to tears, water, and other elements your kids encounter. The costume does not have many removable parts making it reliable for babies and toddlers.
description: Childhood Halloweens are not the same without donning kids pumpkin costumes. Make it a memorable one with a photo-op worthy, comfortable boys and girls pumpkin costume from Kangaroo!
Quick Halloween Trick or Treat Outfit:

Tired of all the Halloween decorating and nitty-gritty that you forgot to get your toddler Halloween costume? Being a pumpkin this year is a definite lifesaver. Just put on some warm and long clothes underneath and don this costume. Affordable and quick!

Kangaroo kids pumpkin costumes are made of comfortable and durable material that will not irritate children’s delicate skin. They come in vibrant pumpkin colors making your kids looking eye-catchy and super duper cute, perfect as toddler costumes!Fabric is easy to wipe and wash with no buttons or other removable parts so it is convenient for curious babies and children.
Toddler Halloween Costumes for Girls and Boys (and for Other Occasions:

Are you looking for your babies' costumes that can be reused on different occasions! We got you! Be a Pumpkin at Halloween, Thanksgiving, Easter, or Veggie parties! Whether you are looking for a baby costume that can last years. Or, a quick Halloween themed costume. Or fun and cute costume for your first-time Trick-or-treater. Kangaroo Pumpkin Costumes can be your perfect choice. Get yours now!
